title: Includes the war on terrorism within the definition of "period of war" for purposes of the veterans alternative property tax exemption
summary: Includes the war on terrorism within the definition of "period of war" for purposes of the veterans alternative property tax exemption; clarifies the availability of real property tax exemptions for activated reservists who return from active duty but remain affiliated with a reserve unit.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to including the war on terrorism within the definition of "period of war" for purposes of the veterans alternative property tax exemption
